title: Poster, "Creativity: The Human Resource", 1980
signed: Signed in white, left center: [in bubble] Milton Glaser
description: Poster depicts a tree, with its trunk shaped like a hand on a background consisting of dark blue sky and green grass; from the branches and leaves fall small colorful objects, such as planets and birthday hats. Text in white, upper margin: CREATIVITY / [in green] THE HUMAN RESOURCE; in white, right center: A Gift of the Chevron Family of Companies [with Chevron logo]; lower margin: A CELEBRATION OF CREATIVITY IN AMERICAN AND IN YOU. / AN EXHIBIT AT THE UNION CARBIDE BUILDING, NEW YORK, AUGUST 9-OCTOBER 26, 1980.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Creativity: The Human Resource", 1980.
1980. Offset lithograph. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-423.
